title: How do I copy contacts from my SIM/UIM card to my phone?
answer:
**Step 1** In the contact list, touch  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=15722)à  Manage contacts. From the displayed option menu, choose **Copy contacts**. 

 **Step 2** Choose to copy contacts from the SIM/UIM card, wait for your phone to load the contacts, and select the contacts you want to copy or touch **SELECT ALL**. 

 **Step 3** Touch **COPY**, and follow the onscreen instructions to copy the contacts to your phone.
